data.name: richTextBox1.Text
data.value:
File to File You select file,application will extract text and generate new translated file to the destinition
Image text translation Application is able to scan text inside the image and provide translation to extracted text,Image can be selected either through url provided or local selected.
Existing audio File translation Application will go through your audio file and transform audio to text,and provide translation to it
Notes: 1. Image and existing require some reconginition behind the scene,therefore,there might be a chance program doesn't interpret the words correctly 2. According to the previous statement the qualities of file can reflect on qualities on the translation result.

data.name: richTextBox2.Text
data.value:
End-User License Agreement (EULA) of English Language Network Assistant
This End-User License Agreement ("EULA") is a legal agreement between you and English Language Network Assistant
This EULA agreement governs your acquisition and use of our English Language Network Assistant software ("Software") directly from English Language Network Assistant or indirectly through a English Language Network Assistant authorized reseller or distributor (a "Reseller").
Please read this EULA agreement carefully before completing the installation process and using the English Language Network Assistant software. It provides a license to use the English Language Network Assistant software and contains warranty information and liability disclaimers.
If you register for a free trial of the English Language Network Assistant software, this EULA agreement will also govern that trial. By clicking "accept" or installing and/or using the English Language Network Assistant software, you are confirming your acceptance of the Software and agreeing to become bound by the terms of this EULA agreement.
If you are entering into this EULA agreement on behalf of a company or other legal entity, you represent that you have the authority to bind such entity and its affiliates to these terms and conditions. If you do not have such authority or if you do not agree with the terms and conditions of this EULA agreement, do not install or use the Software, and you must not accept this EULA agreement.
This EULA agreement shall apply only to the Software supplied by English Language Network Assistant herewith regardless of whether other software is referred to or described herein. The terms also apply to any English Language Network Assistant updates, supplements, Internet-based services, and support services for the Software, unless other terms accompany those items on delivery. If so, those terms apply.
License Grant
English Language Network Assistant hereby grants you a personal, non-transferable, non-exclusive licence to use the English Language Network Assistant software on your devices in accordance with the terms of this EULA agreement.
You are permitted to load the English Language Network Assistant software (for example a PC, laptop, mobile or tablet) under your control. You are responsible for ensuring your device meets the minimum requirements of the English Language Network Assistant software.
You are not permitted to:
Edit, alter, modify, adapt, translate or otherwise change the whole or any part of the Software nor permit the whole or any part of the Software to be combined with or become incorporated in any other software, nor decompile, disassemble or reverse engineer the Software or attempt to do any such things Reproduce, copy, distribute, resell or otherwise use the Software for any commercial purpose Allow any third party to use the Software on behalf of or for the benefit of any third party Use the Software in any way which breaches any applicable local, national or international law use the Software for any purpose that English Language Network Assistant considers is a breach of this EULA agreement Intellectual Property and Ownership
English Language Network Assistant shall at all times retain ownership of the Software as originally downloaded by you and all subsequent downloads of the Software by you. The Software (and the copyright, and other intellectual property rights of whatever nature in the Software, including any modifications made thereto) are and shall remain the property of English Language Network Assistant.
English Language Network Assistant reserves the right to grant licences to use the Software to third parties.
Termination
This EULA agreement is effective from the date you first use the Software and shall continue until terminated. You may terminate it at any time upon written notice to English Language Network Assistant.
This EULA was created by eulatemplate.com for English Language Network Assistant
It will also terminate immediately if you fail to comply with any term of this EULA agreement. Upon such termination, the licenses granted by this EULA agreement will immediately terminate and you agree to stop all access and use of the Software. The provisions that by their nature continue and survive will survive any termination of this EULA agreement.
Governing Law
This EULA agreement, and any dispute arising out of or in connection with this EULA agreement, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of United States.
